metadata.name: Washed Away
metadata.description:
2017 I got my first drone and I was hooked. It wasn't my first dabble into aerial photography but it changed the game for me on a personal and professional level. I could perfect my shots and get those perfect compositions. I could fly whenever I wanted and when the conditions were just right. I could throw it in my backpack and travel the world with this drone. That's exactly what I did. What a time that was. A whole new world from the air. 

This shot was taken at Capistrano Beach Park in Dana Point California better known as Capo Beach. #Hypecourts was trending on the gram. This red court next to the beach was such a Southern California vibe! That was until December 2018 When high tides and beach erosion caused by global warming took away this part of the coastline. This court is now gone but at least I have this photo.  

This drop is a fundraising project from my archives to get me to NFT NYC.
